name: mini-ball-game
description:
This game is a tribute to an old mobile game of the feature phone era

A very simple game: you control the ball with left and right arrow keys. The blue platforms move upwards and you must not hit any red serpentine lines. Hearts add to your number of lives (upper left). The longer you survive, the faster the platforms will move. Oh, and jumping adds to your score more than just staying on platforms.
